Perfil · Collaborator

Prof. Gabrielle Weber Martins

Theoretical collaborator

UEBA!

Theoretical collaboration in materials and electronic structures.

Professora e colaboradora teórica em iniciativas de pesquisa conjunta com o ComputEEL/MatSci.

Collaborator Theory

Theoretical collaborator of ComputEEL/MatSci, Gabrielle joins initiatives on electronic structures and materials modelling.

Her experience with theoretical methods complements the group’s fronts in superconductivity and thermodynamics.

Topics of interest: electronic-structure theory, collaboration with experimental teams, superconductivity.

ComputEEL/MatSci

Computational Materials Science · DEMAR · EEL/USP

E-mail: computeel@usp.br
